title: パンケーキやさん
description: A heartwarming story about a bear who opens a pancake shop in the forest and serves delicious pancakes to various animal customers.

pages.title: パンケーキやさんのオープン
pages.description: A bear opens a small pancake shop in the forest

sentences.きょう、くまはもりにちいさなパンケーキやさんをひらきました。: Today, the bear opened a small pancake shop in the forest.

pages.title: いらっしゃいませ
pages.description: The bear welcomes customers and prepares the pan

sentences.「いらっしゃいませ。」くまはフライパンをあたためます。: "Welcome." The bear heats up the frying pan.
sentences.ぷつぷつ、こえがきこえます。: Bubble, bubble, you can hear the sound.

pages.title: りすのおきゃくさん
pages.description: The first customer, a squirrel, orders honey pancakes

sentences.いちばんのおきゃくさんはりすです。: The first customer is a squirrel.

pages.title: はちみつパンケーキ
pages.description: The bear makes honey pancakes for the squirrel

sentences.くまはじゅうっとやいて、はちみつをとろり。: The bear grills it sizzling hot and drizzles honey.
sentences.りすは「おいしい！」とほっぺをおさえます。: The squirrel says "Delicious!" and holds her cheeks.

pages.title: ことりのリクエスト
pages.description: A little bird orders strawberry pancakes

pages.title: いちごパンケーキ
pages.description: The bear makes strawberry pancakes with cream

sentences.あかいいちごをぽんぽん、クリームをちょこん。: Red strawberries plop plop, cream dollop.

pages.title: うさぎのチョコレート
pages.description: A rabbit orders chocolate sauce pancakes

sentences.「チョコソースをたっぷりください。」: "Please give me lots of chocolate sauce."

pages.title: チョコソースパンケーキ
pages.description: The bear makes chocolate sauce pancakes

sentences.くまはくるくるとかけます。: The bear swirls it around and around.
sentences.うさぎは「しあわせ！」とめをきらきらさせます。: The rabbit says "I'm happy!" and makes her eyes sparkle.

pages.title: きつねのバターとメープル
pages.description: A fox orders butter and maple syrup pancakes

sentences.きつねがしっぽをふってきました。: A fox came wagging his tail.
sentences.「バターとメープルシロップをください。」: "Please give me butter and maple syrup."

pages.title: バターメープルパンケーキ
pages.description: The bear makes butter and maple syrup pancakes

sentences.バターがとけて、メープルがつやつや。: The butter melts and the maple syrup is glossy.
sentences.きつねは「これはさいこうだね。」とほほえみます。: The fox smiles and says "This is the best."

pages.title: たぬきのバナナとくるみ
pages.description: A raccoon orders banana and walnut pancakes

pages.title: バナナくるみパンケーキ
pages.description: The bear makes banana and walnut pancakes

sentences.くまはバナナとくるみをのせて、できあがり。: The bear puts banana and walnuts on top, and it's ready.

pages.title: こぐまのきょうだい
pages.description: Little bear siblings order a large pancake to share

sentences.「ふたりでわけられる、おおきいのをください。」: "Please give us a big one that we can share."

pages.title: おおきなパンケーキ
pages.description: The bear makes a large pancake for the siblings

sentences.くまはフライパンいっぱいにたねをながします。: The bear pours batter to fill the frying pan.
sentences.ぷくっとふくらんで、いいにおい。: It puffs up and smells good.

pages.title: みんなでおてつだい
pages.description: The ingredients are running low, so everyone helps

sentences.そのとき、たねがもうすこしでなくなりそう。: At that moment, the batter was almost running out.

pages.title: みんなのパンケーキ
pages.description: Everyone works together to make a special pancake

sentences.できあがったのは、とくべつな「みんなのパンケーキ」。: What was completed was a special "Everyone's Pancake."
sentences.まんなかにハートのはちみつがきらり。: In the middle, honey in the shape of a heart sparkles.

pages.title: いただきます
pages.description: Everyone enjoys the special pancake together

sentences.「いただきます！」とこえがそろいます。: "Let's eat!" their voices say in unison.
sentences.もりに、やさしいあまさがひろがりました。: A gentle sweetness spread through the forest.

pages.title: おひるねのじかん
pages.description: It's nap time and the shop closes

sentences.おみせは「またあした」とかんばんをとじます。: The shop closes its sign saying "See you tomorrow."

pages.title: つぎはどんなトッピング
pages.description: The bear looks forward to tomorrow's toppings

sentences.「つぎはどんなトッピングにしようかな。」: "I wonder what toppings I should make next."
